advance_trafalgar: Advance to Trafalgar Square. If you pass Go, collect £200
advanace_pallmall: Advance to Pall Mall. If you pass Go, collect £200
advance_station: Advance to the nearest Station. If unowned, you may buy it from the Bank. If owned, pay wonder twice the rental to which they are otherwise entitled
advance_utlity: Advance token to nearest Utility. If unowned, you may buy it from the Bank. If owned, throw dice and pay owner a total ten times amount thrown.
to_jail: Go to Jail. Go directly to Jail, do not pass Go, do not collect £200
general_repairs: Make general repairs on all your property. For each house pay £25. For each hotel pay £100
advance_kingscross: Take a trip to Kings Cross Station. If you pass Go, collect £200
chairman: You have been elected Chairman of the Board. Pay each player £50
